mapper.sql: id, hdmc, hdsj, hddz, fwdx, bmkssj, bmjssj, fwlb, zyzbz, hdgs,sfjs,create_time, delflag
mapper.select:
select
from pioneer_volunteer_service where bmkssj <= now() and bmjssj >= now() order by create_time DESC limit #{keyparam.start} , #{keyparam.pageSize}
select count(1) from pioneer_volunteer_service where bmkssj <= now() and bmjssj >= now()

select
from pioneer_volunteer_service where delflag != 'D' and sfjs = '1' order by create_time DESC limit #{keyparam.start} , #{keyparam.pageSize}
select count(1) from pioneer_volunteer_service where delflag != 'D' and sfjs = '1'
mapper.insert:
insert into pioneer_volunteer_service
id,
hdmc,
hdsj,
hddz,
fwdx,
bmkssj,
bmjssj,
fwlb,
zyzbz,
hdgs,
create_time,
delflag,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{hdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hdsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hddz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fwdx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bmkssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{bmjssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{fwlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zyzbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hdgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{delflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.update:
update pioneer_volunteer_service
hdmc = #{hdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hdsj = #{hdsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hddz = #{hddz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fwdx = #{fwdx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bmkssj = #{bmkssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
bmjssj = #{bmjssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fwlb = #{fwlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zyzbz = #{zyzbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hdgs = #{hdgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delflag = #{delflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pioneer_volunteer_service set hdmc = #{hdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hdsj = #{hdsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hddz = #{hddz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fwdx = #{fwdx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bmkssj = #{bmkssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bmjssj = #{bmjssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fwlb = #{fwlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zyzbz = #{zyzbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hdgs = #{hdgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update pioneer_volunteer_service set sfjs = '1' where id = #{id}
